description.value:
When ignited, creates a 30m radius explosion of white powder that inflames the eyes, nose, and throat, inducing nausia for several hours. Lasts for 2d10 rounds, a strong wind clears it in 1 round. Treat as a Thrown Weapon with 10m range and Smoke Quality, those within must make +0 Tougness Test or gain 1 Fatigue.

Effect: Scarce

Notes: 17 T
